titles.title: Congratulating the Lambda Chi Alpha Fraternity on the occasion of its 100th Anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

committee.subcommittee: Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness
committee.name: House Education and Labor

bill.summary: 6/9/2009--Introduced. Congratulates the Lambda Chi Alpha Fraternity on the occasion of its 100th Anniversary. Recognizes its members for their work and dedication to making the fraternity an outstanding and honorable association.
